body.p: In addition, if the Board were to identify a concept of wealth or capital that would meet the information needs of users of financial statements, a single measurement basis would be required in order to produce a measure of that wealth or capital. However, as discussed in paragraphs BC8.1–BC8.4 the Board decided not to update the discussion of capital and capital maintenance and not to seek to identify a concept of wealth or capital that would meet the information needs of users of financial statements.
